title: A non-perturbative method of calculation of Green functions
abstract: A new method for non-perturbative calculation of Green functions in quantum mechanics and quantum field theory is proposed. The method is based on an approximation of Schwinger-Dyson equation for the generating functional by exactly soluble equation in functional derivatives. Equations of the leading approximation and the first step are solved for $\phi^4_d$-model. At $d=1$ (anharmonic oscillator) the ground state energy is calculated. The renormalization program is performed for the field theory at $d=2,3$. At $d=4$ the renormalization of the coupling involves a trivialization of the theory.
